argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
Character. .T. = The named thread is running.
.F. = The thread is not running.

page.description: Returns true if threadname is a running thread
page.discussion: The THREAD_IS_RUNNING() function returns TRUE if the named thread is running. No user interface related commands are allowed in a thread. Using any command that attempts to create or manipulate any type of user interface from within a thread will cause Alpha Anywhere to hang. Examples of such invalid functions include debug() , ui_*, StatusBar.*, ControlPanel.*, trace.*, etc. .
